speaker: customer
dialogue: Those seagulls... stealing your food

speaker: customer
dialogue: They are annoying, they have always been.

speaker: customer
dialogue: Many years ago, attacked by seagulls I was.

speaker: customer
dialogue: Seagulls! Stop it now!

speaker: cook
dialogue: ehhh.. Who are you??!

speaker: customer
dialogue: You must be the last food stand owner on the beach

speaker: customer
dialogue: Don't worry, I'll help you to protect this stand

speaker: cook
dialogue: No I'm just passing by…

speaker: customer
dialogue: But I need energy to protect! Cook me Anything!

speaker: cook
dialogue: I said I'm just passing…

speaker: customer
dialogue: Drag some food to the plate and COOK!

speaker: cook
dialogue: Those seagulls pecked his brain too many times..

speaker: customer
dialogue: You get a new recipe, you can check them in the recipes.

speaker: customer
dialogue: Keep trying different combinations.

speaker: customer
dialogue: Before that, the food is getting cold!

speaker: customer
dialogue: Give it to me give it to me

speaker: customer
dialogue: I'm happy with any food.

speaker: customer
dialogue: But some people might have their preference.

speaker: customer
dialogue: And different food gives different buff.

speaker: customer
dialogue: Check before you cook!

speaker: customer
dialogue: I'll start fighting those seagulls for you!

speaker: customer
dialogue: That's all. Chasing seagulls away or they will take your food.

speaker: customer
dialogue: see ya!
